aima.core.agent.impl

Class AbstractEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • aima.core.agent.impl.AbstractEnvironment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Environment, EnvironmentViewNotifier
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CellWorldEnvironment, MapEnvironment, VacuumEnvironment, XYEnvironment

    public abstract class AbstractEnvironment
extends java.lang.Object
implements Environment, EnvironmentViewNotifier
    Author:
    Ravi Mohan, Ciaran O'Reilly

        public void createExogenousChange()
        Method for implementing dynamic environments in which not all changes are directly caused by agent action execution. The default implementation does nothing.

      • step

        public void step()
        Central template method for controlling agent simulation. The concrete behavior is determined by the primitive operations getPerceptSeenBy(Agent), executeAction(Agent, Action), and createExogenousChange().
        Specified by:
        step in interface Environment
